00037 /**
00038  * \file feature.h 
00039  * \brief  Public declarations for \ref Features module.
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/modules/feature.h,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.20 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2006/08/30 19:20:01 $
00044  */
00045 
00046 #ifndef _FC_FEATURE_H_
00047 #define _FC_FEATURE_H_
00048 
00049 #ifdef __cplusplus
00050 extern "C" {
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * \ingroup  PrivateFeatures
00055  * \brief Feature object
00056  *
00057  * \description
00058  *
00059  *    This object is set up for use within and by a FC_FeatureGroup -- it's not
00060  *    really set up to be used on it's own.  Stores ids of ROI's (indices into
00061  *    a feature group's ROI list).  Stores ids of the child & parent IDs of the
00062  *    feature.
00063  *
00064  * \modifications  
00065  *   - FEB-18-2003  W Koegler  Created
00066  */
00067 typedef struct {
00068   int id;         /**< this feature's id in the feature group */
00069   int numROI;     /**< number of ROIs in this feature */
00070   // the stepID & subset locate ROI in space-time
00071   int *stepIDs;   /**< the step (i.e. time) ids, numROI long */
00072   int *roiIDs;    /**< the ROI ids (for stepIDs[i]), numROI long */
00073   // the ids within the feature group
00074   int numParent;  /**< number of parent features */
00075   int *parentIDs; /**< parent ids */
00076   int numChild;   /**< number of child features */
00077   int *childIDs;  /**< children ids */
00078 } _FC_Feature;
00079 
00080 /**
00081  * \ingroup  Features
00082  * \brief Feature Group object
00083  *
00084  * \description
00085  *
00086  *    This object manages the ROIs and the features. An ROI is a space-time
00087  *    location, i.e., a step and a subset.  The feature group stores the subset
00088  *    handles of the ROIs (FC_Subset) but does not own them (they may
00089  *    disappear).  The group creates the features and is responsible for
00090  *    freeing them.
00091  *
00092  * \todo ? add reference to step values (a sequence perhaps)? 
00093  *
00094  * \modifications  
00095  *   - FEB-18-2003  W Koegler  Created
00096  */
00097 typedef struct {
00098   // ROI information
00099   int numStep;         /**< Number of steps this group covers  */
00100   int* numROIperStep;  /**< Array of number of ROIs in each step */ 
00101   FC_Subset** rois;    /**< 2D array of ROIs (subsets), 
00102                  numStep x numROIperStep[numStep] */
00103   int** roiFeatureIDs; /**< 2D array - for each ROI, the id of feature 
00104                  containing  it */
00105   // Feature Information
00106   int numFeature;         /**< total number of features */ 
00107   _FC_Feature** features;  /**< 1D array of pointers to features */ 
00108 } FC_FeatureGroup;
00109 
00110 // Feature Group creation & destruction
00111 FC_ReturnCode fc_createFeatureGroup(FC_FeatureGroup **group);
00112 void fc_freeFeatureGroup(FC_FeatureGroup *group);
00113 
00114 // Feature Group feature manipulation
00115 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_newFeature(FC_FeatureGroup *group, int stepID, 
00116                       FC_Subset roi, int *featureID);
00117 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_setParentChildPair(FC_FeatureGroup* group,
00118                                int parentID, int childID);
00119 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_continueFeature(FC_FeatureGroup* group, 
00120                                int featureID, int stepID, FC_Subset roi);
00121 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_noFeaturesThisStep(FC_FeatureGroup*group,
00122                       int stepID);
00123 // Group Query
00124 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_getNumStep(FC_FeatureGroup* group, int* numStep);
00125 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_getNumFeature(FC_FeatureGroup *group, 
00126                                int *numFeature);
00127 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_getNumROI(FC_FeatureGroup *group, int* numROI);
00128 // Query Step of a group
00129 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_getNumFeatureInStep(FC_FeatureGroup *group, 
00130                                int stepID, int *numFeature);
00131 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_getFeatureIDsInStep(FC_FeatureGroup *group, 
00132                                int stepID, int *numFeature, int** featureIDs);
00133 FC_ReturnCode fc_featureGroup_getROIsInStep(FC_FeatureGroup* group, 
00134                                int stepID, int* numROI, FC_Subset** rois);
00135 // Feature Query
00136 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureNumROI(FC_FeatureGroup *group, int featureID, 
00137                                int* numROI);
00138 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureROIs(FC_FeatureGroup* group, int featureID, 
00139                                int* numROI, int** stepIDs, FC_Subset** rois);
00140 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureROIAtStep(FC_FeatureGroup* group, int featureID,
00141                          int stepID, FC_Subset* ROI);
00142 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureNumParent(FC_FeatureGroup *group, int featureID, 
00143                                int* numParent);
00144 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureParentIDs(FC_FeatureGroup* group, int featureID, 
00145                       int* numParent, int** parentIDs);
00146 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureNumChild(FC_FeatureGroup *group, int featureID, 
00147                                int* numChild);
00148 FC_ReturnCode fc_getFeatureChildIDs(FC_FeatureGroup* group, int featureID, 
00149                       int* numChild, int** childIDs);
00150

00152 //-------------------------------

00154 FC_ReturnCode fc_writeFeatureGroup(FC_FeatureGroup *group, char *filename);
